subject: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for Empanelment/ De-empanelment of Members to the Dispute Resolution Boards (DRBs)
text: 'Ra 774 TTHNf qferar<u (Tsq 4Rdev & RTHPf #R1T4, 4RG TAR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 07r Tt ii-5 &a 6, #q7-10, ErVT, #f foclt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 T/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/Dispute Resolution Board/2024 Policy Circular No.2.2.13/ 2024 dated 28th November, 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/DRB/2O2O (Comp. No. 3033)} Sub: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for Empanelment/ De-empanelment of Members to the Dispute Resolution Boards (DRBs). reg_ With reference to the above, the following Procedure will be followed for dealing with the Empanelment / De-empanelment of DRB Members: 1 Submission of Applications: a. Interested Applicants may submit their applications on their own or against any advertisement of NHAI accompanied by detailed Resumes, Relevant Qualifications and Experience Certificates along with Self-Declaration on Vigilance Cases, PC Act etc. of the Individual during his Service, if applicable to Legal & Arbitration Division: b. Legal & Arbitration division shall maintain a record of all applications received and submit a quarterly compilation of applications to DRB Empanelment Committee. 2 Eligibility Criteria: The eligibility criteria for Empanelment as a DRB Member shall be as follows: a Stature: Retired Chairman, Member & CGM of NHAI, Retired Secretary / Add. Secretary/ JS, Retired DG/ ADG/CE of MoRTGH, Retired DG/ ADG/CE of CPWD, Retired Secretary (Roads) of State Govt. General Chief /CE of State PWDs and equal cadre Officers of other departments recruited through Engineering Services. b Technical Competence_(Desirable): Experience in Infrastructure work for not less than 5 years in the capacity of Executive Engineer and above: C Expertise (Desirable): Having Experience in handling disputes as DRE DRB Member and or as Arbitrator. Familiarity with Arbitration & Conciliation Act, 1996. Enlisted Arbitrator with MoRTH/ IRC. d_ Age Limit: Maximum 70 years (At the time of empanelment): e Clearance from Vigilance, PC Act & from Other Similar Cases. 3_ DRB Empanelment Committee: a. DRB Empanelment Committee shall consist of CGM (Legal); CGM (CMD) & Advisor (Legal). Contd_2I - 41 7 " 9 NHAL
